name: Space Cleaner Cannon
description:
Take to space and clear up the Asteroid belt in a new take on an arcade classic

-New rock varieties with the Speedeor and Doom Rock

-Use sound waves and fumes as new defense tools against the wave of rocks

-Boost, Turn around, And even brake with a new control scheme

-5 unique mini games

Controls for Keyboard and Controller (Assuming Xbox format)

Forward - Up arrow or D-Pad up/RT

Backwards - Down arrow or D-Pad down/LT

Turn Left - Left arrow or D-Pad left

Turn Right - Right arrow or D-pad right

Brake - Z key or LB

Boost - X key or X Button

Flip - C key or RB

Shoot - A key or A Button

Sound wave - S key or Y Button

Fumes -  D key or B Button

Exit to menu- Escape key or Start Button

This game is finished development-wise, However if there are any major oversights or glitches, Feel free to inform us on our Discord server
